# PS4 Ultra Age

`CUSA14637.savepatch`

### 1. Untested - Make sure to backup your save data first
### 2. Max Power Gear - Resource (Resets to 999 if you pick one up)

Target File: `*`

```
80010017 496E7665
6E746F72 79536176
65446174 61537472
75637400 00000000
8801000B 5265736F
75726365 5F303100
8802000B 496E7450
726F7065 72747900
28000015 0000270F
```
